title: One person shot and killed in Longs Friday 5 hours ago
content: One person shot and killed in Longs Friday, (MGN Graphic)    Longs, S.C. (WPDE) —    A man was killed Friday night in Longs after a shooting on Anna Drive, according to Horry County police.    The victim has been identified as 59-year-old Dennis Bellamy. He died from a gunshot wound, according to Horry County Deputy Coroner Michelle McSpadden.    Police were called to the home around 9:30 p.m.    A suspect has been arrested. The suspect's name is expected to be released when the warrant has been served.    Horry County police are investigating.
